mapper.insert:
insert into orderGroup(ogr_no, ogr_reciName, ogr_reciTel, ogr_reciZipCode, ogr_reciAddr1, ogr_reciAddr2, ogr_payPlan, ogr_accHold, ogr_accHoldNo, ogr_approvalNo, ogr_invoice, org_state, mem_no) values(orderGroupSeq.nextval, #{ogr_reciName}, #{ogr_reciTel}, #{ogr_reciZipCode}, #{ogr_reciAddr1}, #{ogr_reciAddr2}, #{ogr_payPlan}, #{ogr_accHold}, #{ogr_accHoldNo}, #{ogr_approvalNo}, #{ogr_invoice}, #{org_state}, #{mem_no})
SELECT ogr_no FROM dual
